name: interact4trust-experiment2
description: Humidity Prediction Visualization Trust Study - Experiment 2: Per-city display format variations (region vs ensemble lines)

scripts.test: echo 'Open http://localhost:8010 in browser to test experiment'
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp -r src dist/ && cp -r display dist/ && cp save_data.php complete_study.php simple_index.html dist/ && mv dist/simple_index.html dist/index.html && mkdir -p dist/data && for d in versions/version*/; do cp -r "$d" dist/$(basename "$d"); done && echo 'Multi-version build complete'

author: Research Team
